short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With the click of a button, create your own list of favorite vacation rentals to easily find & book them at a later date.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're like me, you spend a lot of time searching & researching vacation rentals across various accommodation websites. 

Wouldn't it be nice if you could store all your favorites in one place?

That's why I created the STAYS FOR LATER plug-in...

Create your very own place to save all your favorite accommodations!
 
          âŒ Stop using clunky bookmarks or platform's silo'd wishlists.

           âœ… Start using the STAYS FOR LATER button to easily save off your favorite listings! 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Here's how it works:

ğŸŒ Go to a listing you want to save for later & click the "Save listing" button to add it to your favorites list located in the Chrome browser extension.
 
ğŸ¡ To view & access your favorites list, just click on the Stays for Later icon at the top of your browser. 

ğŸŒ To find a specific listing, you can either scroll or use the keyword search at the top of your list.

ğŸ¤¿ Click on the name of the listing to retrieve the listing so you can do further review or book your next stay!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The vacation rental platforms currently available for use with this extension are:
